mapper.sql: p.price_id, pp.price_policy_id, p.car_spec_id, s.brand, s.model_name, pp.discount_rate, p.daily_price, p.price_1m, p.price_3m, p.price_6m, pp.use_yn AS use_yn, pp.deleted_at AS deleted_at, pp.updated_at AS updated_at
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM price p JOIN car_spec s ON p.car_spec_id = s.spec_id LEFT JOIN price_policy pp ON pp.spec_id = s.spec_id AND pp.unit_type = 'DAILY' AND pp.use_yn = 'Y' WHERE p.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY s.brand, s.model_name

SELECT p.price_id, pp.price_policy_id, s.spec_id AS car_spec_id, s.brand, s.model_name, pp.discount_rate, p.daily_price, p.price_1m, p.price_3m, p.price_6m, p.use_yn, p.updated_at FROM car_spec s LEFT JOIN price p ON p.car_spec_id = s.spec_id AND p.use_yn = 'Y' LEFT JOIN price_policy pp ON pp.spec_id = s.spec_id AND pp.unit_type = 'DAILY' AND pp.use_yn = 'Y' WHERE s.spec_id = #{carSpecId} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE price SET daily_price = #{dailyPrice}, price_1m = #{price1m}, price_3m = #{price3m}, price_6m = #{price6m}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE price_id = #{priceId} AND use_yn = 'Y'
UPDATE price_policy SET discount_rate = #{discountRate}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE price_policy_id = #{pricePolicyId} AND use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO price ( car_spec_id, daily_price, price_1m, price_3m, price_6m, use_yn, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{carSpecId}, IFNULL(#{dailyPrice}, 0), IFNULL(#{price1m}, 0), IFNULL(#{price3m}, 0), IFNULL(#{price6m}, 0), 'Y', NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO price_policy ( spec_id, unit_type, base_price, discount_rate, use_yn, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{carSpecId}, 'DAILY', /* 단기 정책 고정 */ IFNULL(#{dailyPrice}, 0), /* 기준가는 일일 대여료로 설정 */ IFNULL(#{discountRate}, 0), 'Y', NOW(), NOW() )
